column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I was having massive ramen withdrawals since I've been back from my short trip to Japan and Jinya did a fantastic job satiating my needs. I was already prepared to be disappointed since I've been to Jinya several times in the past and have never really been WOW'ed with their old menu. But I see they have been doing a little tweaking. From the top of my head
column2: in the past I've tried the Tsukemen dipping ramen (discontinued)
column5: and the spicy chicken ramen. My last visit is the most memorable one yet.
